short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a 'Random Page' link to the bottom navbar on mcmaster.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension adds a button to the bottom navbar of your browser that when clicked, takes you to a randomly selected page on http://mcmaster.com. This is a useful tool for those in the manufacturing and industrial fields, as it allows for easy exploration of the website and the discovery of new and relevant products and information. It can also be used as a tool for research and inspiration for new projects.

This extension and its developer have no affiliation with http://mcmaster.com or its owners.
